caption.p: A schematic illustration of the inline double-pass Machâ€“Zehnder interferometer (MZI); arrows indicate excited cladding modes of the length of fibre separating the two tapers, creating different optical path lengths for higher order modes traveling in the cladding and fundamental core mode travelling in the core.
